title: Orionid meteor shower peaks next week: When and where to see it
description: The Orionids are thought to be one of the most impressive meteor displays. Visible from early October to early November, it will peak this week around 22 October. Here's more on how you can see it.
content:
Prepare yourself for a fireworks spectacle this coming week as the Orionids grace our night sky with the peak of their annual display.
The Orionid meteor shower happens 60 miles up in space and is thought to be one of the most impressive displays of ... [1831 chars]

title: Dhanteras: Why India's Diwali gold rush is different this year
description: Soaring gold prices have dented jewellery demand but Indians are not ready to give up on the metal yet.
content:
Ahead of the Hindu festival of Diwali, the jewellery market in Indian capital Delhi's vibrant Lajpat Nagar neighbourhood is teeming with crowds.

title: Fentanyl: How the US is emerging from its drugs death epidemic
description: Fatal overdoses in the US are falling - and Kayla's state of North Carolina is at the forefront of that trend.
content:
Kayla first tried fentanyl as a troubled 18-year-old, growing up in the US state of North Carolina.
"I felt like literally amazing. The voices in my head just completely went silent. I got instantly addicted," she remembers.

title: Mysterious 'warm blob' breaks records in the North Pacific Ocean
description: Temperatures have surged across a large area of the north Pacific - and scientists don't know exactly why.
content:
The waters of the north Pacific have had their warmest summer on record, according to BBC analysis of a mysterious marine heatwave that has confounded climate scientists.

description: The Pakistani convict called himself a "walking dead person" just days before his last voyage destined for Houthi rebels in Yemen.
